Title: Directs the office of the state comptroller to conduct a study on establishing a universal pension system
Summary: Directs the office of the state comptroller to conduct a study on establishing a universal pension system in the state of New York; requires the office of the state comptroller to submit a report of such study.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the office of the state comptroller to conduct a study on establishing a universal pension system in the state of New York
